DOC.brief_summary: The Y-balance test low extremity , dynamic test perform single limb stance measure person 's ability reach 3 direction . The test typically conduct barefoot . The purpose study assess impact footwear Y-Balance test score . The investigator hypothesize improve alignment augment muscle mechanic , sandal medial arch support may improve Y-Balance score .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Supportive Sandals Y-Balance Performance Healthy Young Individuals
DOC.criteria: Men Women age 21 40 year , inclusive Grossly intact symmetrical neuromuscular status Able ambulate without difficult pain Able understand information inform consent form willing able sign inform consent form history ankle sprain , Anterior cruciate ligament injury ; recent hip , knee , foot ankle pain within past 6 month Uncontrolled Heart ( Hypertension ; BP > = 140/90 ) , Lung Disease ( uncontrolled asthma shortness breath ) , diabetes Nursing pregnant Not willing able follow procedure specify protocol and/or instruction study personnel Unable fit available shoe size
